<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Deduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1845) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 151 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Investigator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=41)

**Prerequisites**
[Investigator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1844)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [investigator feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=13/feats) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Deduction leads to...</title>
[Advanced Deduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1847)
name: Basic Deduction
